bradley.head: spr_bradley_head
bradley.name: BRADLEY
bradley.desc:
BRADLEY
Age: 25
Recent college grad
Everything to lose
Sucks up by talking about videogames with superiors
Special Ability: Always pays credit card on time

drguy.head: spr_drguy_head
drguy.name: DR. GUY
drguy.desc:
DR. GUY
Age: 60
Two degrees overqualified
Part of his contract includes naps
Steals Chad’s food from the fridge
Special Ability: Coworkers he doesn’t like 'disappear'

finnley.head: spr_finnley_head
finnley.name: FINNLEY
finnley.desc:
FINNLEY
Age: 39
Loves his wife and kids
Chess savage; Takes no prisoners
Just wants to go home at 3
Special Ability: Remembers your birthday every year

chad.head: spr_chad_head
chad.name: CHAD
chad.desc:
CHAD
Age: 23
Cannot spell college
Can spell 'moisturizer'
Always texting (but who?)
Special Ability: Any mistakes he makes are someone else’s fault

pamela.head: spr_pamela_head
pamela.name: PAMELA
pamela.desc:
PAMELA
Age: 43
Buff soccer mom
Used to sleep, 'before the first kid'
Will not speak aloud until 11AM
Special Ability: Can type 150WPM perfect, eyes closed

gina.head: spr_gina_head
gina.name: GINA
gina.desc:
GINA
Age: 22
Has seen anime. All the anime.
Full millennial - gets an extra paycheck to run the company 'Insta'
Fluent in coding languages you 'probably haven’t even heard of'
Special Ability: Always has pockets

truck.head: spr_truck_head
truck.name: TRUCK
truck.desc:
TRUCK
MPG: 19
Stick Shift
At least eight wheels
Has delivered all kinds of shit
Special ability: honk (Select)

jeff.head: spr_jeff_head
jeff.name: JEFF
jeff.desc:
JEFF
Age: 21
Has been charging a power drill for ten years
Absurdist philosophy meshes with office politics
Opinionated intern
Special Ability: Can sleep through anything
